thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Jennie R.
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Jennie R.

author: Jennie R.
title: Jennie R.
text:
I saw Finn's company, Solar Quote: s, on Facebook and decided to contact them to help me with this process.
I completed the online questionnaire to enable them to source the right people for my needs.
I received the contact information very quickly and a document to input data received from the Quote: s for compariaon. There were also some handy tips and questions to ask to ensure I got the best value from the companies.
Two of the installers visited me to assess my needs and discuss options and one did a review online. The two that visited provided me with Quote: s via email within 24 hrs of visiting me. The third promised but, unfortunately, never provided me with a Quote: .
This service saved me a lot of time doing online research and knocking on doors of people with solar panels in my area.
Solar Quote: s are very good with follow-up emails to see how things are progressing.
It is a great service and I have no hesitation in recommending them.
